item.title: [White Codex] Devlog #1 - Magic and Dungeon
item.description: Survival Project - promotional poster found on Wikipedia I am excited to share that I am currently working on a new game that is inspired by some of the mechanics in “Survival Project”, which is game that I used to play when I was alot younger. “Survival Project” was a MMORPG with simple mechanics, but unfortunately, the game servers closed down in 2013. You can still play at a private server - Survival Project - Generations though, but the feel is just different…
